articles.title: Coffee Day Hit With $3.2 Million Fine By SEBI, Must Pay In 45 Days - NDTV
articles.description: Coffee Day Enterprises was fined Rs 260 million by the markets watchdog for failing to recover dues from a sister concern, an order published on the regulator's website showed on Tuesday.
articles.content:
SEBI said Coffee Day must pay the fine in 45 days
